thread.title: New ramp connects Roman Forum with palace in Rome
thread.title_full: New ramp connects Roman Forum with palace in Rome

title: New ramp connects Roman Forum with palace in Rome
text: > Entertainment New ramp connects Roman Forum with palace in Rome Partial view of the restored frescoes adorning the Aula entrance to the Imperial Palace, a complex built by Emperor Domitian on the Palatine hill in the Roman Forum, in the 1st century A.D., during a preview for the media in Rome, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. Visitors to the Eternal City have a new way of seeing Rome as the ancient Romans did thanks to the opening of a spectacular, seven-level ramp leading from the Roman Forum up to the Palatine Hill. (AP Photo/Domenico Stinellis)
